text: LiU AIF FK is a Swedish football club located in Linköping. ==Background== LiU AIF FK currently plays in Division 4 Östergötland Västra which is the sixth tier of Swedish football. They play their home matches at the Ryd konstgräsplan in Linköping. The club was previously known as FC Innerstan. LiU AIF FK are affiliated to Östergötlands Fotbollförbund. FC Innerstan played in the 2010 Svenska Cupen but lost 2–3 at home to Myresjö IF in the preliminary round. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Level !Division !Section !Position !Movements |- |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|2008 |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|Tier 8 |style="background:#EDC9AF;"| Division 6 |style="background:#EDC9AF;"| Östergötland Södra |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|3rd |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|FC Innerstan |- |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|2009 |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|Tier 8 |style="background:#EDC9AF;"| Division 6 |style="background:#EDC9AF;"| Östergötland Södra |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|1st |style="background:#EDC9AF;"|FC Innerstan – Promoted |- |style="background:#7DF9FF;"|2010 |style="background:#7DF9FF;"|Tier 7 |style="background:#7DF9FF;"| Division 5 |style="background:#7DF9FF;"| Östergötland Mellersta |style="background:#7DF9FF;"|1st |style="background:#7DF9FF;"|FC Innerstan – Promoted |- |style="background:#FBA0E3;"|2011 |style="background:#FBA0E3;"|Tier 6 |style="background:#FBA0E3;"| Division 4 |style="background:#FBA0E3;"| Östergötland Västra |style="background:#FBA0E3;"| |style="background:#FBA0E3;"| |} * League restructuring in 2006 resulted in a new division being created at Tier 3 and subsequent divisions dropping a level. |} ==Footnotes== ==External links== * LiU AIF FK – Official website Category:Sport in Östergötland County Category:Football clubs in Sweden
